Class AbstractRobotPart

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.parts.AbstractRobotPart
All Implemented Interfaces:
RobotPart
Direct Known Subclasses:
Arm, Blaster, Camera, Frame, Leg, Rotor, Wheel
public class AbstractRobotPart extends Object implements RobotPart
Abstract class that implements the RobotPart interface. It provides a basic implementation of the methods that are common to all the parts. In particular, it provides a unique incremental id for each part and manages the energy levels of the part.
Author:
marcoortolani

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractRobotPart

      public AbstractRobotPart(double energy_scale_coeff)
      Constructor for an abstract RobotPart. It requires an energy scaling coefficient that will be used to calculate the initial energy level. The initial energy level also affects the time it takes to repair the part.
      Parameters:
      energy_scale_coeff - the coefficient used to scale the base energy level

  • Method Details

    • getId

      protected int getId()
      Returns the unique id of this part.
      Returns:
      the id of this part

    • getCurrentEnergy

      public double getCurrentEnergy()
      Returns the current energy level of this part. This value is always between 0 and the initial energy level.
      Specified by:
      getCurrentEnergy in interface RobotPart
      Returns:
      the current energy level of this part

    • getInitialEnergy

      public double getInitialEnergy()
      Returns the initial energy level of this part, calculated as the base energy coefficient multiplied by the standard base energy level.
      Specified by:
      getInitialEnergy in interface RobotPart
      Returns:
      the initial energy level of this part

    • updateEnergy

      public void updateEnergy(double delta)
      Updates the energy level of this part by adding the given delta. The delta can be positive or negative, but the energy level cannot be negative. If the energy level exceeds the initial energy level, it is set to the initial energy level.
      Specified by:
      updateEnergy in interface RobotPart
      Parameters:
      delta - the amount to be added to the energy level

    • refillEnergy

      public void refillEnergy()
      Restores the energy level of this part to the initial energy level.
      Specified by:
      refillEnergy in interface RobotPart
